titleStmt.title: SII 7.96: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 96. (A.R. No. 87 of 1900). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmātu puṇarap puvimātu vaḷara nāmātu viḷaṅka jayamātu virumpat taṉṉirupatumalar maṉṉavar cūṭa maṉṉiya vurimaiyāl maṇimuṭi cūṭic ceṅkol ceṉṟu ticaitoṟu naṭa
ppa veṅkali nīṅki meyyaṟan taḻaippak kaliṅka ririyaka kaṭāmalai naṭātti valaṅko ḷāḻi varaiyāḻi naṭātti Irucuṭaraḷavum Orukuṭai niḻaṟṟa vīrasiṁhāsanattu mukkokkiḻā
naṭikaḷoṭum vīṟṟiruntaruḷiya kopparakecaripaṟmarāna tribhuvanacakravattikaḷ śrīvikramacoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu Āṟāvatu Etirāmāṇṭu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattuk kāliyūrk
koṭṭattuk kāḻiyūrnāṭṭuk kuṭanakar Ūrom Ūrkkuc camaintu Ivvūrp peruntuṟaiUṭaiyāṉ Iravi Eḻuvaneṉum Eḻuvaṉ Ulakuṭaiyāneṉum Eḻuvaṉ IraviEṉum Eḻuvaṉ piḷḷainampiE
ṉum peruntuṟaiUṭaiyāṉ Ulakuṭaiyāṉ vāḻavantāneṉum Uḷḷiṭṭa Ūrom Ivvūr yāṇṭu Āṟāvatu peruveḷḷaṅkoṇṭu Ūrum pokamu maḻintu Anartthappaṭṭu Ivvū riṟai Iṟukkaik kuṭa
lilāmaiyil Ivvūr nīrnilam koṭupāṭṭut teṉkaḻaniyil kiḻpāṟkellai Īkaicceṟukkaḷukkuk kiḻakku naṭṭakallukku meṟkum teṉpāṟkellai tiruvottūr Eri cempiyaṉ
mātevippereriyilniṉṟum tiruvottūrkku nīrpāyuṅ kecavavāykkālukku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai puḷiyañceṟuvukkum Ālañceṟuvukkum kiḻakku naṭṭakallukku
kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai kovaṉceṟuvum karuṇākaraṉceṟuvukkum teṟku naṭṭakallukku teṟkum Innāṟperellaikkum Uṭpaṭṭa nīrnilamum varampum kāṭum kaḷarum meṭum
menokkiya maramum kīḻnokkiya kiṇaṟum tiruvulakaḷanta śrīpātakkolāl kuḻi Iraṇṭāyiramum peṟuvilaikkāṇaṅ kiḻikaiccelat tantu viṟṟuttarak koḷvīruḷīro veṉṟu kūṟa Im
moḻi keṭṭu Etirmoḻi kuṭuttoṉ Iṅkanāṭṭu naṭṭuvāykkuṭi naṭṭuvāykkuṭaiyāṉ Ātittaṉ Uyyavantāne nāṉuṟo Āḷuṭaiyār tiruvottūruṭaiyāraik kumpiṭṭu śivaliṅgārccana
m paṇṇiyirukkum tapassi viṭaiyiṉmelvaruvāṉukkum Ivan vaṁśattārkkum maṭappuṟamāka Ippūmi peṟuvilaikkāṇaṅ kiḻikaiccelattantu koḷveneṉa muṟkūṟiya peruntuṟai Uṭaiyārkaḷukkup peṟuvilai
kkāṇak kiḻikaic celak kuṭutta Aṉṟāṭu naṟkācu Irupattañcu māvaṇakkaḷiyeṟakkoṇṭu Ivvoru veli nilamum Iṟaiyiliyāka naṭṭuvāykkuṭaiyāṉ Ātittaṉ Uyyavantān viṭaiyiṉmelvaruvāṉukku maṭappuṟa
māka viṭa viṟṟuk kuṭuttom kuṭanakarūrkkuccamaintu peruntuṟaiUṭaiyārkaḷom Innilattukkup puṇaṟkālālum paḷḷakkālālum nirpāyap peṟuvatākavum Āṟṟettamiṭ ṭiṟaikka kollaiyiṟ kālapeṟuvatāka
vum Innilattukku Eccoṟṟuk kūṟṟunel veṭṭi muṭṭaiyāḷc ceṉṉi ramañci yuḷḷiṭṭa Eppoṟpaṭṭa tirukkoṟṟavāytalāṟ ponta kuṭimai collappeṟātomākavum Ittaṉmattukku Iṭaiyūṟu vāṟāmaṟ kāk
kakkaṭavomākavum Iṭaiyūṟu variṟ dharmmāsanattile nitta mañcāṭi poṉ maṉṟappeṟuvatākavum maṉṟupāṭu Iṟuttum Ittanmam cantirātittavarai nilainiruttakkaṭavomāka Oru kālāvatu mirukālāva
tu mukkālāvatum viṟṟukkuṭuttom kuṭanakarūrkkuc camaintu peruntuṟaiUṭaiyārkaḷom Ittanmam śrīpanmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.96 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
